review: Dr. Farheen has been such a blessing for me. She is truly concerned about her patients, how they feel, and making sure they feel better.
name: CHERYL A.

review: Everyone in the office was exceedingly kind and Dr. Faheen was very knowledgeable and probing in her exam.
name: NANVY C.

review: I felt confident in what I needed to do for my lower back after my visit. Thank you so much Dr. Farheen!
name: ZOYA M.

review: She listens to you, explains everything well and the most important thing is that she worries about her patient.
name: YELLENI W.

review: A very professional group, didn’t have to wait long to see the doctor. Dr. Farheen has the patience to listen and explains clearly her diagnosis.
name: NICK Z.

review: Dr Farheen listened to all my issues and how we’re going forward to getting me feeling better. Thank you.
name: ROSIE M.

review: Dr. Farheen took her time with me we will meet later to decide what changes to make. Definitely a team effort for my health.
name: MARIA W.
